```js function show_pos(pos) { var geostr = '

Latitude (deg): ' + pos.coords.latitude + '

Longitude (deg): ' + pos.coords.longitude + '

Accuracy (m): ' + pos.coords.accuracy + '

AltitudeAccuracy (m): ' + pos.coords.altitudeAccuracy + '

Heading (deg): ' + pos.coords.heading + '

Speed (m/s): ' + pos.coords.speed + '

Timestamp: '+ pos.timestamp; $('#geopos').html(geostr); } ```
